sentence.Network_cn: 贝尼托·加罗佐赢得让人心悦诚服。

sentence.Network_en: These results demonstrate convincingly that our campaign is working.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些结果有力地证明，我们的运动正在发挥作用。

sentence.Network_en: He spoke so convincingly that you couldn't help believing him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说得有根有梢的,不由得你不信.

list.abs: She reply to my point so convincingly that my argument is soon in tatter ., 她反驳我提出的各点都很有说服力 , 很快就将我的论点驳倒.
He argued convincingly ., 他的辩论很令人信服.

it is result that new curve is more reasonable than former in contrast with actual data , which convincingly shows that processing method of high-resolution is practical .结果显示，新曲线在与实测资料的对比中表现出更明显的合理性，这有力地说明了各种高分辨率处理方法的实用性。
and third , we shall have demonstrated more convincingly the superiority of the socialist system ., 第三 , 就更加能够体现社会主义制度的优越性.

entry.tran: 令人信服的;使人心悦诚服的;有说服力的
entry.def: If you describe someone or something as convincing, you mean that they make you believe that a particular thing is true, correct, or genuine.

example.ex: Scientists say there is no convincing evidence that power lines have anything to do with cancer...
example.tran: 科学家们说，并没有确凿的证据表明输电线和癌症之间有什么联系。
他的话听起来很有说服力。
